title: Al Pinkins returning to Tech basketball staff - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Al Pinkins returning to Tech basketball staff - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Al Pinkins is returning to Texas Tech to join Mark Adams' staff as an assistant coach after working at the University of Florida for the past four seasons. Pinkins was on the Red Raider coaching staff during the 2016-17 and 2017-18 seasons where he helped the program reach the 2018 NCAA Elite Eight.
